name: HIGGS BOSON DISCOVERY #4 - ALICE
description:
A series created to mark the discovery of the Higgs-Boson particle by extracting the images associated with the discovery and abstracting them into 3D objects via geometry displacement.

This image is a representation of the ATLAS detector in the Large Hadron Collider at CERN. While not directly credited with the Higgs boson discovery, it is a crucial part of the array of detecting equipment at the LHC.
